faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does an automation project take?
faq.a1: Time varies depending on project complexity. A small project may take 2-4 weeks, while a more complex one may extend several months. We provide precise estimates after an initial evaluation.
faq.q2: What tools do you use for performance testing?
faq.a2: I use industry-leading tools like Apache JMeter, NeoLoad, LoadRunner and k6, depending on the project's specific needs.
faq.q3: Do you offer maintenance for automation scripts?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer proactive maintenance plans to ensure your automation scripts keep working correctly even after updates to your application.
